TopicTitle: [0.90] LazTek SpaceX Launch, Exploration, Colonial Transporter & Historic mods (1/25/14)

Articles.Content: Will the new dragon have fully functional thrusters/engines?

So.... Release soon? Please?

If no release, could we have more AWESOME pictures?
Yes, pictures would do well to help my sanity. Been watching Elon Musk interviews all day and pulling my hair out. no joke.

I had to make some last minute decisions on how certain parts are configured and am finishing my testing tonight. Following this, I'm putting up the new packs in low and high resolution versions. As requested, here are more pics:

Gonna use the awesome 3m open/close nosecone to relaunch my GPS network!

One thing to think about as you test: does it play well with mechjeb? (rcs thrusters and engine)

Edited July 30, 2013 by LazarusLuan

Not sure what happened to the ships between setting up the distribution folders and compressing them, but I've fixed and uploaded the files. I'm not following the "legacy install" question, which makes me think I missed some change they made in Kerbal while I was busy working on the new updates. What do I need to change?

The pack seems as if its to be installed in the 'Parts' and 'Internals' folders, as it was done in KSP 0.19 and prior. This now called Legacy folders, since they are not used anymore, not even by Squad.

Most mods now (since 0.20) use the GameData folder to install, same as Squad.

Those Legacy folders will not be there forever, Squad left them there post 0.20 to give people (mod devs) time to adjust to new file structure.

Using the new file/config structure is also good for things like cloning/resizing parts by using same model, texture, and config.
